    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product(int productID,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String shortDescription,
               java.lang.String longDescription,
               java.lang.String[] image,
               double cost,
               double retail,
               int discount,
               int quantityOnHand,
               int quantityOnOrder,
               boolean discontinued,
               boolean sale)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor including all parameters.
        Parameters:
        productID - The item number of the product.
        name - The name of the product.
        shortDescription - A short description of the product for the "Product" page.
        longDescription - A long description of the product for the "Product Details" page.
        image - A String array containing urls of image for the product.
        cost - The cost of the product to the retailer, including packaging and labor, not including retail markup.
        retail - The retail price of the product, cost + markup.
        discount - The discount on the product as an integer, between 0 and 100.
        quantityOnHand - The quantity retailer has on hand.
        quantityOnOrder - The quantity the retailer has on order.
        discontinued - Is the product discontinued?
        sale - Is the product on sale?
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • Product

        public Product(int productID,
               java.lang.String name,
               double cost,
               double retail)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor including minimum parameter of "productID", "name", "cost", and "retail". The remaining parameters are set to default values to avoid null values.
        Parameters:
        productID - The item number of the product.
        name - The name of the product.
        cost - The cost of the product to the retailer, including packaging and labor, not including retail markup.
        retail - The retail price of the product, cost + markup.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getCost

        public double getCost()
        Getter for "cost".
        Returns:
        the cost of the product. Cost should include the total cost of the product, i.e. - how much the retailer paid for the product, plus the cost of any packaging and storage of the product that the retailer incurred.

      • setCost

        public void setCost(double cost)
        Setter for "cost".
        Parameters:
        cost - The cost of the product. Cost should include the total cost of the product, i.e. - how much the retailer paid for the product, plus the cost of any packaging and storage of the product that the retailer incurred.
